update goods
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_Desc = #{nameDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
random_Name = #{randomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
image_URL = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

start_Time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_Time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_Desc = #{nameDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, random_Name = #{randomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, image_URL = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store = #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_Time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_Time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select price from goods where id = #{goodsId}
